text:
@rogerstrevor1 @LauraLoquacious @MattHancock Hello Trevor. May I please ask for your qualifications that enable you to claim that Covid19 is no worse than the flu?

Surely the fact that it's continuing to spread outside of the Flu season, is more infectious and has a higher mortality rate demonstrates otherwise
